title: C.E.O.s Are Talking More About Recession
description: The possibility of an economic slowdown has been a hot topic during the latest batch of quarterly earnings conference calls.
dc:creator: Stephen Gandel
media:credit: Valerie Plesch for The New York Times
media:description: Howard Schultz, the interim chief executive of Starbucks, at the DealBook D.C. Policy Forum in June.
